column1: === {{TranslateThis | anchor = en | en = Irish Sites and Monuments Record ID }} === {{Property proposal |status = 4057 |description = {{TranslateThis | en = identifier in Sites and Monuments Record database of Ireland. }} |infobox parameter = |1= in [[commons:Template:Archaeological Survey of Ireland]] |datatype = external-id |domain = archaeological monuments and sites of the Republic of Ireland |allowed values = [A-Z]{2}[0-9]{3}-[0-9-]{7} |source = https://data.gov.ie/dataset/national-monuments-service-archaeological-survey-of-ireland |example = * {{Q|1775146}} → [http://webgis.archaeology.ie/historicenvironment/?SMRS=LE014-004001- LE014-004001-] * {{Q|33313}} → [http://webgis.archaeology.ie/historicenvironment/?SMRS=CW007-010---- CW007-010----] |planned use = |formatter URL = http://webgis.archaeology.ie/historicenvironment/?SMRS=$1 |external links = webgis.archaeology.ie/historicenvironment/ |see also = |filter = |robot and gadget jobs = |subpage = Irish Sites and Monuments Record No. |topic = authority control }} ;Motivation Identifier for cultural heritage monuments in Ireland. Take a look at Commons template documentation and [[:en:Archaeological Survey of Ireland]] for more information. [[User:Pawel Marynowski (WMIE)|Pawel Marynowski (WMIE)]] ([[User talk:Pawel Marynowski (WMIE)|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 08:05, 6 June 2017 (UTC)

** {{ping|ChristianKl}} Thanks, can you look at this one too [[Wikidata:Property proposal/Irish National Monument No.]]? I think we are done there. [[User:Pawel Marynowski (WMIE)|Pawel Marynowski (WMIE)]] ([[User talk:Pawel Marynowski (WMIE)|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 19:36, 14 June 2017 (UTC)

***{{ping|Pawel Marynowski (WMIE)}} That proposal is open for 6 days and not 7. At best you set it to "ready" once the 7 days are up. [[User:ChristianKl|ChristianKl]] ([[User talk:ChristianKl|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 19:42, 14 June 2017 (UTC)
